oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
John Edmonds family at their log home
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Front view of a log home with a family sitting on the edge of the porch
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Children; Housing; Log buildings; Wheat (Tenn.)
Edmonds, Ella; Edmonds, Flora; Edmonds, John; Edmonds, Leonard; Edmonds, Ruth
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Addresses for Jim and Flora Edmonds were listed on the back of the photograph.

On front of image, 61-266; (TVA KX 634; John Edmonds Family; 1939. On back, ORO 61-266; Label on back that states "House located on East Fork Valley Road. John Edmonds Family (Had Family of 10 Children) Picture - L to R John, Ella, Ruth, Leonard and Flora is in her Mother's arms. House was built by John and his son Jim Edmonds (Picture not shown)
